testsuite.name: FileServerTest

The response says that the file was created! Client started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 2 Enter filename: > test_purpose_PXGYEC.txt Enter file content: > UGCD5TZP The request was sent. The response says that creating the file was forbidden! Client started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_PXGYEC.txt The request was sent. The content of the file is: UGCD5TZP Client started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 1 Enter filename: > test_purpose_IQKNZBO.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was not found! Client started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 Enter filename: > test_purpose_IB8O6.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was not found! Client started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > 3 Enter filename: > test_purpose_PXGYEC.txt The request was sent. The response says that the file was successfully deleted! Client started! Enter action (1 - get a file, 2 - create a file, 3 - delete a file): > exit The request was sent.
